verses.roman:
prabhu guru-buddhye karena sambhrama, sammāna
teṅho chidra cāhi' bule,--ei tāra kāma

synonyms: prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; guru-buddhye—accepting him as a Godbrother of His spiritual master; karena sambhrama sammāna—offers full respect and obeisances; teṅho—Rāmacandra Purī; chidra cāhi'-trying to find fault; bule—goes about; ei—this; tāra—his; kāma—business.
translation: When they met, the Lord would offer him respectful obeisances, considering him a Godbrother of His spiritual master. Rāmacandra Purī's business, however, was to search for faults in the Lord.
